discussion.content: D. Verify that the processes are still needed

Selected Answer: C
The best approach to address this concern is C. Map the processes to a capability maturity model.

A capability maturity model (CMM) is a framework for assessing the maturity of an organization's processes. It provides a way to measure how well the organization's processes are defined, managed, and controlled. By mapping the processes to a CMM, the CIO can identify the processes that are most in need of improvement.

questions.question_text: Which of the following would BEST support an enterprise's initiative to incorporate desired organizational behaviors into the IT governance framework?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
C. Enterprise code of ethics.

An enterprise code of ethics outlines the principles, values, and standards of behavior that employees are expected to adhere to within the organization. By incorporating desired organizational behaviors into the IT governance framework through a code of ethics, the enterprise can establish a clear set of guidelines and expectations for IT professionals and stakeholders.

A code of ethics promotes integrity, accountability, transparency, and ethical decision-making in all aspects of IT governance. It helps to foster a positive organizational culture and ensures that IT initiatives and activities are aligned with the organization's values and objectives.

questions.question_text: An IT risk committee is trying to mitigate the risk associated with a newly implemented bring your own device (BYOD) policy and supporting mobile device management (MDM) tools. Which of the following would be the BEST way to ensure employees understand how to protect sensitive corporate data on their mobile device?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
The BEST way to ensure employees understand how to protect sensitive corporate data on their mobile devices, especially in the context of a newly implemented bring your own device (BYOD) policy and mobile device management (MDM) tools, is to require staff to complete security awareness training (Option B).

Security awareness training is a comprehensive approach that educates employees on security policies, procedures, and best practices. In the case of BYOD policies, training can cover topics such as secure device usage, password management, data encryption, safe handling of corporate information, and awareness of potential threats. This helps employees become informed and responsible users of their mobile devices, contributing to the overall security of corporate data.

B. outcome measures and performance drivers.

An IT balanced scorecard helps organizations measure and manage the performance of their IT functions in alignment with strategic objectives. It typically includes a mix of financial and non-financial metrics, focusing on various perspectives such as financial, customer, internal processes, and learning and growth.

By incorporating outcome measures and performance drivers, an IT balanced scorecard allows organizations to track the results and impacts of IT initiatives on business outcomes. It helps identify key performance indicators (KPIs) that are directly linked to achieving strategic objectives and delivering value to the organization.
